titles.title: Expanding Educational Freedom and Opportunity for Families Act
Expanding Educational Freedom and Opportunity for Families Act
To codify Executive Order 14191 relating to expanding educational freedom and opportunity for families, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
